lead_paragraph: A South Carolina prosecutor announced on Friday that a sheriff’s deputy will not face charges stemming from a 2015 incident in which he was videotaped flipping a female student across a classroom.

headline.print_headline: Ex-Officer Not Charged for Flipping and Dragging Student
headline.main: Deputy Who Tossed a S.C. High School Student Won’t Be Charged

snippet: A South Carolina prosecutor announced on Friday that a sheriff’s deputy will not face charges stemming from a 2015 incident in which he was videotaped flipping a female student across a classroom....
abstract: South Carolina Solicitor Dan Johnson says he finds no probable case to charge former sheriff's deputy Ben Fields over 2015 incident in which Fields tossed student at Spring Valley High School across classroom.
